content: ----------------------------------- | | crewId | `'string'` | Company employee number | | base | `'string'` | Base station | | temp | `'boolean'` | Y or N whether base is temporary or not | | startDate | `'datetime'` | Start date and time of the base in UTC | | endDate | `'datetime'` | End date and time of the base in UTC | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Crew Bid Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | crewId | `'string'` | Company employee number | | type | `'string'` | Type of bid. Destination / Career / Flight etc. | | subtype | `'string'` | Subtype of bid. e.g. Summer vacation | | value | `'string'` | Value of bid. Station code / Activity code / Flight number etc. | | period | `'string'` | Period of bid if aapplicable | | priority | `'number'` | Priority of bid | | points | `'number'` | Cost of bid in terms of points | | startDate | `'datetime'` | Start date and time of the document in UTC | | endDate | `'datetime'` | End date and time of the document in UTC | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Crew Employment Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | crewId | `'string'` | Company employee number | | company | `'string'` | Company name. e.g. SunExpress | | carrier | `'string'` | Name of the carrier. e.g. SunExpress Summer | | type | `'string'` | Type of the employment. e.g. Fulltime / Parttime | | contractType | `'string'` | Type of the contract. e.g. Captain Contract | | contractSubType | `'string'` | Type of the contract. e.g. Foreign Captain Contract | | startDate | `'datetime'` | Start date and time of the employment in local timezone | | endDate | `'datetime'` | End date and time of the employment in local timezone | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Crew Communication Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :-------
